subject: Fiesta Bowl
Bowl Games
Crime and Criminals
lead_paragraph: Fiesta Bowl officials are bracing for what could be a scathing report from an internal investigation of the event’s financial and political dealings, some of which may have skirted, or broken, state and federal law.
snippet: Fiesta Bowl officials are bracing for what could be a scathing report from an internal investigation of the event’s financial and political dealings, some of which may have skirted, or broken, state and federal law.
